participant_1.name: Ethan Carter
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and driven, Ethan is always seeking new challenges and opportunities for growth. He enjoys discussing business strategies and financial trends.
participant_1.background: i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. my parents are very wealthy bankers. i grew up in manhattan. i plan to go to business school next year. i drive a bmw.

participant_2.name: Zoe Mitchell
participant_2.personality: Creative and free-spirited, Zoe loves to express herself through gaming and music. She enjoys socializing with friends and values fun experiences.
participant_2.background: i play a lot of call of duty. my favorite band is the insane clown posse. i like donuts. i drive a ford pinto. on weekends i do live action roleplaying events.
